query.prompt:
This text is written in Spanish. Create a word table showing the Lemma for each word. The entries in the table are Word, Lemma, Part of Speech, Gender, Number, Person, Tense, Mood and Note.
* Decompose the contraction in Lemma. * Leave blank if not applicable. * Words linked by an apostrophe should be separated. * The Note should be writtern in brief, e.g. archaic. * Quotation marks should be excluded. Apostrophes in contractions are not quotation marks. * If the verb and the other word are combined, they should be separated by Lemma. In such cases, only the verb information should be written in the other columns.
1 En la mitad del camino de nuestra vida 9 diré de las otras cosas que allí vi. 28 Después que hube reposado un poco el cuerpo cansado, 67 Me respondió: «No hombre, hombre fui ya,
query.result: | Word | Lemma | Part of Speech | Gender | Number | Person | Tense | Mood | Note | |---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---|---| | En | en | preposition | | | | | | | | la | el | definite article | f. | sg. | | | | | | mitad | mitad | noun | f. | sg. | | | | | | del | de + el | preposition + article | | | | | | | | camino | camino | noun | m. | sg. | | | | | | de | de | preposition | | | | | | | | nuestra | nuestro | possessive adjective | f. | sg. | | | | | | vida | vida | noun | f. | sg. | | | | | | diré | decir | verb | | | 1 | future | indicative | | | de | de | preposition | | | | | | | | las | el | definite article | f. | pl. | | | | | | otras | otro | indefinite article | f. | pl. | | | | | | cosas | cosa | noun | f. | pl. | | | | | | que | que | relative pronoun | | | | | | | | allí | allí | adverb | | | | | | | | vi | ver | verb | | | 1 | past | indicative | | | Después | después | adverb | | | | | | | | que | que | conjunction | | | | | | | | hube | haber | verb | | | 3 | past | subjunctive | | | reposado | reposar | verb | | | 1 | past | participle | | | un | un | indefinite article | m. | sg. | | | | | | poco | poco | adverb | | | | | | | | el | el | definite article | m. | sg. | | | | | | cuerpo | cuerpo | noun | m. | sg. | | | | | | cansado | cansado | adjective | m. | sg. | | | | | | Me | me | personal pronoun | | | 1 | | | | | respondió | responder | verb | | | 3 | past | indicative | | | No | no | negation | | | | | | | | hombre | hombre | noun | m. | sg. | | | | | | hombre | hombre | noun | m. | sg. | | | | | | fui | ser | verb | | | 1 | past | indicative | | | ya | ya | adverb | | | | | | |

query.prompt:
